title: Farming with a difference
brief_description: The secret of successful farming is scientific management. At a demonstration farm at Hobbs Cross, visiting farmers come to garner the fruits of research. Hobbs Cross is shown to be a practical house of notions that farmers can adapt to their own needs and pockets.
